00040 template <class MatType>
00041 class SimpleToleranceTermination
00042 {
00043  public:
00045   SimpleToleranceTermination(const double tolerance = 1e-5,
00046                              const size_t maxIterations = 10000,
00047                              const size_t reverseStepTolerance = 3)
00048             : tolerance(tolerance),
00049               maxIterations(maxIterations),
00050               reverseStepTolerance(reverseStepTolerance) {}
00051 
00057   void Initialize(const MatType& V)
00058   {
00059     residueOld = DBL_MAX;
00060     iteration = 1;
00061     residue = DBL_MIN;
00062     reverseStepCount = 0;
00063     isCopy = false;
00064 
00065     this->V = &V;
00066 
00067     c_index = 0;
00068     c_indexOld = 0;
00069 
00070     reverseStepCount = 0;
00071   }
00072 
00079   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00080   {
00081     arma::mat WH;
00082 
00083     WH = W * H;
00084 
00085     // compute residue
00086     residueOld = residue;
00087     size_t n = V->n_rows;
00088     size_t m = V->n_cols;
00089     double sum = 0;
00090     size_t count = 0;
00091     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00092     {
00093         for(size_t j = 0;j < m;j++)
00094         {
00095             double temp = 0;
00096             if((temp = (*V)(i,j)) != 0)
00097             {
00098                 temp = (temp - WH(i, j));
00099                 temp = temp * temp;
00100                 sum += temp;
00101                 count++;
00102             }
00103         }
00104     }
00105     residue = sum / count;
00106     residue = sqrt(residue);
00107 
00108     // increment iteration count
00109     iteration++;
00110 
00111     // if residue tolerance is not satisfied
00112     if ((residueOld - residue) / residueOld < tolerance && iteration > 4)
00113     {
00114       // check if this is a first of successive drops
00115       if (reverseStepCount == 0 && isCopy == false)
00116       {
00117         // store a copy of W and H matrix
00118         isCopy = true;
00119         this->W = W;
00120         this->H = H;
00121         // store residue values
00122         c_index = residue;
00123         c_indexOld = residueOld;
00124       }
00125       // increase successive drop count
00126       reverseStepCount++;
00127     }
00128     // if tolerance is satisfied
00129     else
00130     {
00131       // initialize successive drop count
00132       reverseStepCount = 0;
00133       // if residue is droped below minimum scrap stored values
00134       if(residue <= c_indexOld && isCopy == true)
00135       {
00136         isCopy = false;
00137       }
00138     }
00139 
00140     // check if termination criterion is met
00141     if(reverseStepCount == reverseStepTolerance || iteration > maxIterations)
00142     {
00143       // if stored values are present replace them with current value as they
00144       // represent the minimum residue point
00145       if(isCopy)
00146       {
00147         W = this->W;
00148         H = this->H;
00149         residue = c_index;
00150       }
00151       return true;
00152     }
00153     else return false;
00154   }
00155 
00157   const double& Index() const { return residue; }
00158 
00160   const size_t& Iteration() const { return iteration; }
00161 
00163   const size_t& MaxIterations() const { return maxIterations; }
00164   size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00165 
00167   const double& Tolerance() const { return tolerance; }
00168   double& Tolerance() { return tolerance; }
00169 
00170  private:
00172   double tolerance;
00174   size_t maxIterations;
00175 
00177   const MatType* V;
00178 
00180   size_t iteration;
00181 
00183   double residueOld;
00184   double residue;
00185   double normOld;
00186 
00188   size_t reverseStepTolerance;
00190   size_t reverseStepCount;
00191 
00194   bool isCopy;
00195 
00197   arma::mat W;
00198   arma::mat H;
00199   double c_indexOld;
00200   double c_index;
00201 }; // class SimpleToleranceTermination
